responsibilities: Lead the design of solutions within the team to deliver on business and user requirements.
Contribute to code writing, development, and testing while providing leadership towards the completion of solutions.
Mentor and coach more junior members of the team helping to improve their skills, knowledge, and productivity.
Work with Service Management, Financial Management, and Service Portfolio data, preparing it for model integration to support Generative AI applications.
Be the Security Champion, ensuring data security is at the center of all solutioning.
Optimize GenAI pipelines and models to improve quality and reduce computational time, cost.
Assist in the interviewing, onboarding, mentorship, day-to-day leadership, 1:1s, and offboarding of any full-time and/or contractor personnel reporting to you.
Design, write, test, and deploy code to develop and support solutions.
Operate in a dynamic, quickly changing business environment, typically with little direct guidance.
Contribute towards the end-to-end lifecycle of data solutions.
Conduct research, discovery, prototyping, proof of concept implementation, and design concepts.
Participate in the technical evaluation and understanding of business needs.
Review code for correctness and its impact on software and data architecture.
Maintain and sustain data solutions by identifying and fixing defects or quality gaps.
Assist with user onboardings to data platforms, database administration work.
Participate in regular sustainment rotations within the team.
qualifications: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, SQL, and JavaScript.
Experience with big data processing ETL or ELT technologies.
Experience in Database design, development, testing, upgrading, and migration of OLAP and OLTP systems.
Experience in dimensional modeling, design and development of star schemas, normalization techniques.
Familiarity with version control systems, CI/CD practices, testing.
Experience working in an agile/scrum team environment.
Experience with designing and developing microservices architecture.
Experience or awareness with large language models (LLMs) and multimodal models.
Experience with observability tools like Datadog and similar.
Experience with AI frameworks like Langchain, or similar.
analysis:
The job responsibilities include working with Service Management, Financial Management, and Service Portfolio data to prepare it for model integration to support Generative AI applications. Additionally, there is a responsibility to optimize GenAI pipelines and models to improve quality and reduce computational time and cost. These responsibilities clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI.

In the skills section, there is a mention of experience or awareness with large language models (LLMs) and multimodal models, as well as experience with AI frameworks like Langchain or similar. These skills further confirm that the job involves working with language models and Generative AI.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills sections provide clear evidence that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
